description: I am a mathematician currently pursuing a master's degree in mathematics. I have experience in various data management areas, including data analysis and data science. Currently, I work as a data analyst and have experience in data extraction using pipelines deployed on the Azure platform. I am proficient in programming languages such as Python and JavaScript, as well as query languages like SQL and MongoDB. I have experience using data visualization and business intelligence tools like Power BI, and tools related to data extraction, cleaning, and loading from and to various sources. Additionally, I have experience in creating and training time series prediction models and deep learning models using various tools and libraries, primarily in Python, such as TensorFlow, Numpy, and pandas. I also work with data visualization libraries like matplotlib and Plotly. I am a curious, resilient, and disciplined person with strong communication skills and a good team player.
